bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of zheng jia 癥瘕 , concretion-illness and conglomeration-illness, assuming an appearance of pregnancy, with blocked menses and abdominal distension. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 77: 治婦人經脈不通，癥塊脹滿，腹有鬼胎方 , “Recipe to cure women with a blockage of conduit vessels, concretion-illness lumps with distension and a feeling of fullness, and a demon fetus in the abdomen”.
